attributes.action: Make a skatepark for kids in thrybergh
attributes.background: Build a skatepark in thrybergh for the kids as Their is nothing in the community and it's causing antisocial behaviour.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
